resources.string: Notifications to remind you about your upcoming classes
View your upcoming classes and timetable via the widget
Instant sync across all of your devices via the app and extension

Are you having trouble staying on top of your hectic college schedule? Don't know where your classes are? VITTY has got you covered, with VITTY you can have easy access to your timetable no matter where you are!

Simply upload your VIT timetable as text or image and never miss another class again!

Get VITTY Now!

Website: https://dscv.it/vitty

Chrome Extension: https://dscv.it/vitty-extension

Android App: https://dscv.it/vitty-app

iOS App: https://dscv.it/vitty-ios
2. Log in with the same account as shown above.
3. Follow the instructions and upload your timetable.
\u25CB Ensure that the screenshot is taken directly from VTOP. It should fit in one single image.
\u25CB DO NOT upload a screenshot that has been compressed or sent through social media.
\u25CB Individual slot data can be edited by clicking on the edit button.
\u25CB If unsatisfied, click on the three dots and select Upload as Text.
BRAVO! That\'s it. You did it!
In addition to this, you can have a sneak peek at your upcoming classes via the Widget.
You have successfully set up your timetable! You deserve a pat on your back!

Go to your home screen, long press and add widget!

You have two widgets to choose from:
1. Today's Schedule: This shows your current day's classes.
2. Next class: This gives you the details about your next upcoming class.

Get control of the notifications by tapping on ⋮ > Settings > Notifications.

There you can:
1. Turn on No CLasses Mode to pause your class notifications.
2. Individually turn on/off notifications for your classes (Android 8+ only).
To get notifications on time, keep the battery optimisations for the app turned off.\n\nTo change this setting, tap on ⋮ > Settings > Battery.

Don\'t know which class is where? Don\'t worry, we\'ve got you covered!\n\nNow you can hit the directions button on the Next Class widget or tap on a room number in the app to start navigation to your class!
1. Exam/Holiday Mode is now called No Classes Mode.
You\'re all set to start using the app.
Turns off class notifications (formerly Exam/Holiday Mode)
Class notifications turned off (formerly Exam/Holiday Mode)
Turn off battery optimizations to receive notifications on time
We are available on Telegram throughout the day ready to fix your problems!
